label: Product
comment: The ProductInformation class encapsulates detailed information regarding a specific product, including its identification details, manufacturer, and other pertinent details.

datatypeProperties.comment: Information regarding the specific production batch of the product.
The country in which this item was produced / manufactured.
A textual description providing details about the product.
The physical dimensions of the product. Not every dimension is relevant to every products.  For example bulk materials may have wieght and volume but not length, with, or height.
A URL pointing to further human readable information about the product.
The Facility where the product batch was produced / manufactured.
The Party entity that manufactured the product.
A code representing the product's class, typically using the UN CPC (United Nations Central Product Classification) https://unstats.un.org/unsd/classifications/Econ/cpc
A unique identifier (URI) pointing to an image of the product.
The ISO 8601 date on which the product batch was manufactured.
An array of identifiers representing a specific serialised item of the product.
